pr_title: Fix Completion Issues for snippet and pre-declared lang libs

timeline.message: add context aware else and else if block suggestions
add pre declared lang lib suggestion as modules

timeline.bodyText: Any specific reason to maintain a set of pre-declared lang libs? Can't we just have all lang libs starts with lang.*
timeline.author: rasika

replies.bodyText: This is due to #26243 where the compiler now pre-declare langLibs with reserved keywords. So we do not need go add the auto import and also we do not need the suggestions at the import declaration.
replies.author: nadeeshaan

replies.bodyText: Thanks, eventually we need to incorporate this into auto-imports in code-actions.
replies.author: rasika
